instruction: Hello, I'm Bjørn Hansen. My registered email is bjorn.hansen@yahoo.no. I've moved to Storgata 56, Oslo, Norway, 0182, and need to update the billing address for all my existing invoices to this new location.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'bjorn.hansen@yahoo.no';

UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Storgata 56', BillingCity = 'Oslo', BillingCountry = 'Norway', BillingPostalCode = '0182' WHERE CustomerId IN (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'bjorn.hansen@yahoo.no');

instruction: I am Diego Gutiérrez (diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar). I just realized that my invoice with InvoiceID 164 shows 'Argentina' as the BillingCountry, but I was in Uruguay at the time. Please update only the BillingCountry of InvoiceID 164 to 'Uruguay'.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar';
UPDATE invoices SET BillingCountry = 'Uruguay' WHERE InvoiceId = 164 AND CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar');

instruction: My name is Luís Gonçalves (CustomerID: 1, Email: luisg@embraer.com.br). I recently moved, so please update the billing address of my invoice with InvoiceID 327 to the new address: 'Rua Nova Paulista, 1000', city: 'Campinas', state: 'SP', country: 'Brazil', postal code: '13023-212'. Also, notify my support representative Jane Peacock (EmployeeID: 3) by appending '[Customer Luís address updated on InvoiceID 327]' to her Email field.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 1 AND Email = 'luisg@embraer.com.br';

UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Rua Nova Paulista, 1000', BillingCity = 'Campinas', BillingState = 'SP', BillingCountry = 'Brazil', BillingPostalCode = '13023-212' WHERE InvoiceId = 327 AND CustomerId = 1;
UPDATE employees SET Email = Email || ' [Customer Luís address updated on InvoiceID 327]' WHERE EmployeeId = 3;

instruction: My name is Diego Gutiérrez, email diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar. I noticed that the track 'Não Quero Dinheiro' (TrackID 2769), which I previously purchased, is missing the composer. Please verify my purchase of this track and update the Composer to 'Antonio Carlos'.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar';

UPDATE tracks SET Composer = 'Antonio Carlos' WHERE TrackId = 2769 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoice_items JOIN invoices ON invoice_items.InvoiceId = invoices.InvoiceId JOIN customers ON invoices.CustomerId = customers.CustomerId WHERE customers.Email = 'diego.gutierrez@yahoo.ar' AND invoice_items.TrackId = 2769);

instruction: You are Lucas Mancini, CustomerID 47. On your InvoiceID 86, you purchased TrackID 2792 ('A Melhor Forma'). You request to swap this for TrackID 2794 ('32 Dentes') from the same album ('Acústico' by Titãs) on InvoiceLineId 460. Ensure the invoice item updates to TrackID 2794.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 47 AND FirstName = 'Lucas' AND LastName = 'Mancini';
SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 86 AND CustomerId = 47;
UPDATE invoice_items SET TrackId = 2794 WHERE InvoiceLineId = 460 AND InvoiceId = 86 AND TrackId = 2792;

instruction: Hi, I'm Patrick Gray (Customer ID 27). I'd like to update my email address to patrick.gray22@newmail.com. Also, for all my invoices, please change the billing address details to: Street – '451 West 6th St, Apt 10', City – 'Tucson', State – 'AZ', Country – 'USA', and Postal Code – '85719'.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 27
UPDATE customers SET Email = 'patrick.gray22@newmail.com' WHERE CustomerId = 27
UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = '451 West 6th St, Apt 10', BillingCity = 'Tucson', BillingState = 'AZ', BillingCountry = 'USA', BillingPostalCode = '85719' WHERE CustomerId = 27

instruction: Hello, I am Steve Murray with customer ID 54. My current email is steve.murray@yahoo.uk. I need to update my account email to steve.murray1980@gmail.com and change my billing address for future purchases to: 22 Dean Park Crescent, Edinburgh, EH4 1PP, United Kingdom. Please verify my identity using these details and apply the updates.

actions.sql: UPDATE customers SET Email = 'steve.murray1980@gmail.com', Address = '22 Dean Park Crescent', City = 'Edinburgh', PostalCode = 'EH4 1PP', Country = 'United Kingdom' WHERE CustomerId = 54 AND Email = 'steve.murray@yahoo.uk';

instruction: My name is Phil Hughes (CustomerID 53, email phil.hughes@gmail.com). I want to remove the track 'Wake Up' (TrackID 49) from my invoice #109 because I purchased it by mistake. The InvoiceLineId is 588. After removing the track, please update the total on the invoice.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 53 AND Email = 'phil.hughes@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 109 AND CustomerId = 53;
SELECT * FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 588 AND InvoiceId = 109 AND TrackId = 49;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 588 AND InvoiceId = 109 AND TrackId = 49;
UPDATE invoices SET Total = (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity), 0) FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 109) WHERE InvoiceId = 109 AND CustomerId = 53;

instruction: I am Alexandre Rocha (CustomerID 11, email: alero@uol.com.br). Due to our company's merger, please update our official record to reflect the new company name 'Banco Brasil Santander S.A.' and assign Laura Callahan (EmployeeID 3) as my dedicated sales support representative. After updating, provide my revised customer details for verification.

actions.sql: UPDATE customers SET Company = 'Banco Brasil Santander S.A.', SupportRepId = 3 WHERE CustomerId = 11 AND Email = 'alero@uol.com.br';
SELECT CustomerId, FirstName, LastName, Company, SupportRepId FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 11 AND Email = 'alero@uol.com.br';

instruction: Hi, this is Jack Smith (jacksmith@microsoft.com). Please update my profile company to 'Microsoft Corp USA' and change my assigned sales support agent to EmployeeID 4. Also, I purchased the track 'Meditação' (TrackID: 207), but the composer is spelled incorrectly. Please update the composer for TrackID 207 to 'Tom Jobim/Newton Mendonça'.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'jacksmith@microsoft.com'
UPDATE customers SET Company = 'Microsoft Corp USA', SupportRepId = 4 WHERE Email = 'jacksmith@microsoft.com'
UPDATE tracks SET Composer = 'Tom Jobim/Newton Mendonça' WHERE TrackId = 207

instruction: My name is Astrid Gruber and my email is astrid.gruber@apple.at. First, please authenticate me. Then, remove the track 'Shotgun Blues' (TrackID 1179) from only the playlist named '90’s Music' (PlaylistID 5). Ensure the track remains in other playlists, including 'Music' (PlaylistID 1) and 'Music' (PlaylistID 8).

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId, 'Customer' AS Type FROM customers WHERE Email = 'astrid.gruber@apple.at' AND FirstName = 'Astrid' AND LastName = 'Gruber' UNION ALL SELECT EmployeeId, 'Employee' AS Type FROM employees WHERE Email = 'astrid.gruber@apple.at' AND FirstName = 'Astrid' AND LastName = 'Gruber';
DELETE FROM playlist_track WHERE PlaylistId = 5 AND TrackId = 1179;

instruction: I am Kathy Chase, and my email is kachase@hotmail.com. I am cautious about my purchases and expect accurate transaction records. I accidentally purchased the track 'Millenium' (TrackID: 1196) by Incognito in InvoiceID 38. I wish to remove it from my history and receive a refund. Please delete the specific invoice line item with ID 202 from InvoiceID 38 and adjust the invoice total accordingly.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'kachase@hotmail.com';
SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE CustomerId = 21 AND InvoiceId = 38;
SELECT InvoiceLineId FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 202 AND InvoiceId = 38 AND TrackId = 1196;
UPDATE invoices SET Total = Total - (SELECT UnitPrice * Quantity FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 202) WHERE InvoiceId = 38;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 202;

instruction: You are Madalena Sampaio, email masampaio@sapo.pt. You are thorough and organized. First, locate my account using my email masampaio@sapo.pt. Then, update all my past invoices to set the billing address as 'Av. dos Aliados, 15, 1º Esq' in city 'Porto', country 'Portugal', with State and PostalCode left empty. Also, change the contact email of my sales support agent Margaret Park to 'margaret.park.new@chinookcorp.com'.

actions.sql: UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Av. dos Aliados, 15, 1º Esq', BillingCity = 'Porto', BillingState = NULL, BillingCountry = 'Portugal', BillingPostalCode = NULL WHERE CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'masampaio@sapo.pt')

UPDATE employees SET Email = 'margaret.park.new@chinookcorp.com' WHERE EmployeeId = (SELECT SupportRepId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'masampaio@sapo.pt') AND FirstName = 'Margaret' AND LastName = 'Park'

instruction: Hello, this is Stanisław Wójcik (stanisław.wójcik@wp.pl). For my Invoice #282, please remove 'Radio Song' (TrackID 2284) and 'Get Up' (TrackID 2286). Instead, add 'Love Child' (TrackID 751) from Deep Purple and 'Starburst' (TrackID 2527) from Spyro Gyra to the same invoice, both as single units at their standard track price.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'stanisław.wójcik@wp.pl';
SELECT i.InvoiceId FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId WHERE i.InvoiceId = 282 AND c.Email = 'stanisław.wójcik@wp.pl';
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 282 AND TrackId = 2284;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 282 AND TrackId = 2286;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) SELECT 282, 751, (SELECT UnitPrice FROM tracks WHERE TrackId = 751), 1;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) SELECT 282, 2527, (SELECT UnitPrice FROM tracks WHERE TrackId = 2527), 1;

instruction: I am Fynn Zimmermann with CustomerID 37. First, authenticate me by verifying CustomerID 37 matches FirstName 'Fynn' and LastName 'Zimmermann' in the customers table. Then, confirm Invoice #6 belongs to CustomerID 37. If authenticated and verified, delete the song 'Bye, Bye Brasil' (TrackID 230, InvoiceLineId 36) from Invoice #6 and add the song 'Azul' (TrackID 871, UnitPrice 0.99) with Quantity 1 to the same invoice.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 37 AND FirstName = 'Fynn' AND LastName = 'Zimmermann';
SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 6 AND CustomerId = 37;

DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 36 AND InvoiceId = 6 AND TrackId = 230 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 37 AND FirstName = 'Fynn' AND LastName = 'Zimmermann') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 6 AND CustomerId = 37);

INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) SELECT 6, 871, 0.99, 1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 37 AND FirstName = 'Fynn' AND LastName = 'Zimmermann') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 6 AND CustomerId = 37);

instruction: Authenticate me as Terhi Hämäläinen with Customer ID 44 and current email terhi.hamalainen@apple.fi. Update my account email to terhi.h@gmail.com.

actions.sql: UPDATE customers SET Email = 'terhi.h@gmail.com' WHERE CustomerId = 44 AND Email = 'terhi.hamalainen@apple.fi';

instruction: My name is Puja Srivastava and my email is puja_srivastava@yahoo.in. I just bought some music, invoice #284. Please remove 'Infeliz Natal' (TrackID 2334) from this purchase and instead add 'Before You Accuse Me' (TrackID 706, AlbumID 55, UnitPrice 0.99) to the same invoice. I want to keep the rest of the order unchanged.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 284 AND TrackId = 2334 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId WHERE i.InvoiceId = 284 AND c.FirstName = 'Puja' AND c.LastName = 'Srivastava' AND c.Email = 'puja_srivastava@yahoo.in')

INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) SELECT 284, 706, 0.99, 1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId WHERE i.InvoiceId = 284 AND c.FirstName = 'Puja' AND c.LastName = 'Srivastava' AND c.Email = 'puja_srivastava@yahoo.in')

instruction: Hello, I'm Mark Taylor with Customer ID 55 (email: mark.taylor@yahoo.au). On May 30, 2010, I accidentally duplicated my purchase of track 'Sure Know Something' (Track ID 439) under Invoice ID 118. Could you please permanently remove this entire invoice and all its associated items from my account?

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 55 AND Email = 'mark.taylor@yahoo.au';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 118 AND CustomerId = 55;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 118;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 118 AND CustomerId = 55;

instruction: Hello, I am Fernanda Ramos (email: fernadaramos4@uol.com.br). Please update my profile address to Rua das Palmeiras 123, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22080-012, my phone number to +55 21 91234-5678, and assign me to sales agent with EmployeeID 5.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'fernadaramos4@uol.com.br';

UPDATE customers SET Address = 'Rua das Palmeiras 123', City = 'Rio de Janeiro', State = 'RJ', Country = 'Brazil', PostalCode = '22080-012', Phone = '+55 21 91234-5678', SupportRepId = 5 WHERE Email = 'fernadaramos4@uol.com.br';

instruction: Authenticate me as Eduardo Martins from Woodstock Discos using my email eduardo@woodstock.com.br. Verify that I own InvoiceID 372. For this invoice, remove the track 'Down Under' with TrackID 1791 and add the track 'No Quarter' with TrackID 1601, UnitPrice 0.99, and Quantity 1.

actions.sql: SELECT I.InvoiceId FROM invoices I JOIN customers C ON I.CustomerId = C.CustomerId WHERE I.InvoiceId = 372 AND C.Email = 'eduardo@woodstock.com.br'
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId IN (SELECT InvoiceLineId FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 372 AND TrackId = 1791)
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (372, 1601, 0.99, 1)

instruction: I'm Hannah Schneider. To start, for my purchase on February 13, 2010 (Invoice ID: 95), replace the track 'Jump' (Track ID: 3070, Invoice Line ID: 509) with 'Snowblind' (Track ID: 161, Album ID: 17, Unit Price: $0.99, Quantity: 1) on that invoice. Next, update my billing address to 'Berliner Straße 22', Berlin, Postal Code '10117', Country 'Germany' for future transactions. Lastly, change my support representative from Employee ID 5 to Employee ID 4.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 36 AND FirstName = 'Hannah' AND LastName = 'Schneider';
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 509 AND InvoiceId = 95 AND TrackId = 3070;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (95, 161, 0.99, 1);
UPDATE customers SET Address = 'Berliner Straße 22', City = 'Berlin', PostalCode = '10117', Country = 'Germany' WHERE CustomerId = 36;
UPDATE customers SET SupportRepId = 4 WHERE CustomerId = 36;

instruction: Hello, I’m Tim Goyer from Apple Inc. (Customer ID 19). Could you update our company name to 'Apple Worldwide LLC' and assign EmployeeID 5 as our new support representative? Also, please prefix 'Apple Worldwide LLC, ' to the billing address on all our existing invoices.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 19 AND FirstName = 'Tim' AND LastName = 'Goyer' AND Company = 'Apple Inc.'
UPDATE customers SET Company = 'Apple Worldwide LLC', SupportRepId = 5 WHERE CustomerId = 19
UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Apple Worldwide LLC, ' || BillingAddress WHERE CustomerId = 19

instruction: I am Leonie Köhler (customer id 2, email leonekohler@surfeu.de). Please delete my invoice ID 196 issued on 2011-05-19 with a total amount of $1.98, as I purchased incorrect tracks. Remove all associated invoice line items and the invoice record.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId=2 AND Email='leonekohler@surfeu.de';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId=196 AND CustomerId=2 AND DATE(InvoiceDate) = '2011-05-19' AND Total=1.98;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId=196;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId=196 AND CustomerId=2 AND DATE(InvoiceDate) = '2011-05-19' AND Total=1.98;

instruction: I am Wyatt Girard and my email address is wyatt.girard@yahoo.fr. I have moved and need to update my billing address and phone number. My new address is 21 Rue du Bac in Paris, France with postal code 75007, and my new phone number is +33 6 12 34 56 78. Please update my customer record so future invoices use this as the default billing address.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'wyatt.girard@yahoo.fr';
UPDATE customers SET Address = '21 Rue du Bac', City = 'Paris', Country = 'France', PostalCode = '75007', Phone = '+33 6 12 34 56 78' WHERE Email = 'wyatt.girard@yahoo.fr';

instruction: I am Michelle Brooks with email michelleb@aol.com. Please remove all tracks by Eric Clapton (ArtistID: 81) that I have purchased from the 'Music' (PlaylistID: 1) and '90’s Music' (PlaylistID: 5) playlists. Do not remove these tracks from any other playlists or affect any other customer's data. Only modify associations in PlaylistIDs 1 and 5 for TrackIDs I purchased.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'michelleb@aol.com';

DELETE FROM playlist_track WHERE PlaylistId IN (1, 5) AND TrackId IN (SELECT ii.TrackId FROM invoice_items ii INNER JOIN invoices i ON ii.InvoiceId = i.InvoiceId INNER JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId INNER JOIN tracks t ON ii.TrackId = t.TrackId INNER JOIN albums a ON t.AlbumId = a.AlbumId WHERE c.Email = 'michelleb@aol.com' AND a.ArtistId = 81);

instruction: I am Astrid Gruber (astrid.gruber@apple.at). Please process a refund for InvoiceLineId 2012 on Invoice 370 by removing it and deducting 0.99 EUR from the invoice total.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Email = 'astrid.gruber@apple.at';
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 2012 AND InvoiceId = 370;
UPDATE invoices SET Total = Total - 0.99 WHERE InvoiceId = 370;

instruction: I am Joakim Johansson (CustomerID 51). I want to remove the track 'Holiday' (TrackID 1135, InvoiceLineId 758) from my Invoice 139 and have the total recalculated.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 51;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 758 AND InvoiceId = 139 AND TrackId = 1135;
UPDATE invoices SET Total = (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity), 0) FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 139) WHERE InvoiceId = 139 AND CustomerId = 51;

instruction: Hello, I'm João Fernandes with Customer ID 34. For my invoice #257, please update the billing address to 'Rua da Assunção 53, 2º Esquerdo'. Additionally, change my account email to 'joao.fernandes@gmail.com'.

actions.sql: UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Rua da Assunção 53, 2º Esquerdo' WHERE InvoiceId = 257 AND CustomerId = 34;
UPDATE customers SET Email = 'joao.fernandes@gmail.com' WHERE CustomerId = 34;

instruction: You are Joakim Johansson, and your email is joakim.johansson@yahoo.se. As a detail-oriented person who values privacy, you want to permanently delete all traces of your purchases of tracks by the artists 'Motörhead' and 'Mötley Crüe' from your entire purchase history. This includes removing all corresponding invoice items across every invoice. You explicitly confirm and authorize this complete deletion.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId IN (SELECT ii.InvoiceLineId FROM invoice_items ii JOIN invoices i ON ii.InvoiceId = i.InvoiceId JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId JOIN tracks t ON ii.TrackId = t.TrackId JOIN albums a ON t.AlbumId = a.AlbumId JOIN artists ar ON a.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId WHERE c.Email = 'joakim.johansson@yahoo.se' AND (ar.Name = 'Motörhead' OR ar.Name = 'Mötley Crüe'));

instruction: Hello, this is Alexandre Rocha (CustomerID 11) from Banco do Brasil S.A. I need to correct an error in my recent invoice (InvoiceID 349). I accidentally purchased 'Is This Love (Live)' (InvoiceLineId 1898, TrackID 1089) but intended to buy 'Animal' by Pearl Jam (TrackID 2205) from the album 'Vs.' instead. Please remove InvoiceLineId 1898 from Invoice 349 and add one unit of TrackID 2205 to the same invoice at the price of 0.99 USD.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 11 AND FirstName = 'Alexandre' AND LastName = 'Rocha' AND Company = 'Banco do Brasil S.A.';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 349 AND CustomerId = 11;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1898 AND InvoiceId = 349;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (349, 2205, 0.99, 1);

instruction: I am Edward Francis (CustomerID 30). First, authenticate my identity. Then, (1) remove all tracks by 'UB40' from InvoiceID 94 (TrackIDs: 3040, 3044, 3048), but only if it belongs to me. (2) Add every track from the 'Greatest Hits I' album (AlbumID: 185) with MediaTypeId 1 to InvoiceID 333 at UnitPrice 0.99 and Quantity 1, but only if InvoiceID 333 is mine.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 94 AND TrackId IN (3040, 3044, 3048) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices WHERE invoices.InvoiceId = 94 AND invoices.CustomerId = 30);

INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) SELECT 333, TrackId, 0.99, 1 FROM tracks WHERE AlbumId = 185 AND MediaTypeId = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices WHERE invoices.InvoiceId = 333 AND invoices.CustomerId = 30);

instruction: Hello, I am Stanisław Wójcik with Customer ID 49. For invoice number 282, I need to replace the track 'Shiny Happy People' (Track ID 2282, InvoiceLine ID 1524) with 'With Or Without You' (Track ID 3006). Please update only this invoice and recalculate the total amount after the change.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 49
UPDATE invoice_items SET TrackId = 3006, UnitPrice = (SELECT UnitPrice FROM tracks WHERE TrackId = 3006) WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1524 AND InvoiceId = 282 AND TrackId = 2282
UPDATE invoices SET Total = (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 282) WHERE InvoiceId = 282

instruction: I am Ellie Sullivan, with customer ID 33 and email ellie.sullivan@shaw.ca. Please update my last name to 'Sullivan-Wilson' in my customer profile. Separately, for invoice ID 366, remove the invoice line item with ID 1980 ('Plaster Caster') from my purchase history as it was accidental.

actions.sql: UPDATE customers SET LastName = 'Sullivan-Wilson' WHERE CustomerId = 33;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1980 AND InvoiceId = 366 AND InvoiceId IN (SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE CustomerId = 33);

instruction: I am Aaron Mitchell (aaronmitchell@yahoo.ca) and I want to remove the track 'Álibi' (TrackID: 857, InvoiceLineId: 1860) from my invoice #342. After removal, please update invoice #342 so that its total reflects the deletion of this track (unit price: 0.99).

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'aaronmitchell@yahoo.ca';

DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1860 AND TrackId = 857 AND InvoiceId = 342 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices INNER JOIN customers ON invoices.CustomerId = customers.CustomerId WHERE invoices.InvoiceId = 342 AND customers.Email = 'aaronmitchell@yahoo.ca');
UPDATE invoices SET Total = Total - 0.99 WHERE InvoiceId = 342 AND CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'aaronmitchell@yahoo.ca');

instruction: I am Mark Taylor, customer ID 55. I have moved to 99 Collins Street, Sidney, NSW, 2010, Australia. Please update all my previous invoices with the new billing address: 99 Collins Street, Sidney, NSW, Australia, postal code 2010. Also, update my contact email to mark.taylor.new@gmail.com.

actions.sql: UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = '99 Collins Street', BillingCity = 'Sidney', BillingState = 'NSW', BillingCountry = 'Australia', BillingPostalCode = '2010' WHERE CustomerId = 55
UPDATE customers SET Email = 'mark.taylor.new@gmail.com' WHERE CustomerId = 55

instruction: I am Isabelle Mercier, my email is isabelle_mercier@apple.fr. I request to remove the track 'Hats Off To (Roy) Harper' (TrackID: 1645, InvoiceLineId: 1997) from my invoice (InvoiceID: 368) and replace it with 'Moth' (TrackID: 3400) priced at 0.99 for 1 unit.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'isabelle_mercier@apple.fr';

instruction: I am Michelle Brooks (CustomerID: 18). I mistakenly purchased 'Otay' (InvoiceLineId: 1859) on Invoice #341. Please remove it and add 'Palavras Ao Vento' (TrackID: 726) to the same invoice for $0.99 with a quantity of 1. Also, update my billing address to '777 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10065' for future invoices.

SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 341 AND CustomerId = 18
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1859 AND InvoiceId = 341
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (341, 726, 0.99, 1)
UPDATE customers SET Address = '777 Madison Ave', City = 'New York', State = 'NY', PostalCode = '10065' WHERE CustomerId = 18

instruction: I am Dominique Lefebvre with CustomerID 40. Authenticate my identity using my full name and customer ID. Then, verify that InvoiceID 248 belongs to me. Once confirmed, permanently remove the track 'Mr. Brownstone' (TrackID 1150, InvoiceLineId 1342, AlbumID 90) from my purchase record on InvoiceID 248, and update the genre for 'City Of Blinding Lights' (TrackID 2968, AlbumID 235) to 'Alternative & Punk' (GenreID 4).

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE CustomerId=40 AND FirstName='Dominique' AND LastName='Lefebvre'
SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId=248 AND CustomerId=40
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId=1342 AND InvoiceId=248 AND TrackId=1150
UPDATE tracks SET GenreId=4 WHERE TrackId=2968 AND AlbumId=235

instruction: My name is Robert Brown and my email is robbrown@shaw.ca. I noticed the billing address on my InvoiceID 409 should be corrected to: '900 Bay Street', city 'Toronto', state 'ON', postal code 'M5S 3A9', country 'Canada'. Additionally, for the same InvoiceID 409, please remove the track 'Staring At The Sun' (TrackID 2979) from my invoice items.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE FirstName = 'Robert' AND LastName = 'Brown' AND Email = 'robbrown@shaw.ca';

UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = '900 Bay Street', BillingCity = 'Toronto', BillingState = 'ON', BillingCountry = 'Canada', BillingPostalCode = 'M5S 3A9' WHERE InvoiceId = 409 AND CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE FirstName = 'Robert' AND LastName = 'Brown' AND Email = 'robbrown@shaw.ca');

DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 409 AND TrackId = 2979 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM invoices JOIN customers ON invoices.CustomerId = customers.CustomerId WHERE invoices.InvoiceId = 409 AND customers.FirstName = 'Robert' AND customers.LastName = 'Brown' AND customers.Email = 'robbrown@shaw.ca');

instruction: Hello, I am Eduardo Martins (CustomerID 10, email: eduardo@woodstock.com.br). I noticed that in my recent invoice (InvoiceID 251), I accidentally purchased the track 'Aces High' (TrackID 1344) on line item 1366. I actually wanted to purchase 'Powerslave' (TrackID 1345). Please remove line item 1366 from InvoiceID 251, add 'Powerslave' (TrackID 1345) with UnitPrice 0.99 and Quantity 1 to the same invoice, and update the total amount to reflect this change.

actions.sql: SELECT 1 FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 251 AND CustomerId = 10;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1366 AND InvoiceId = 251 AND TrackId = 1344;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (251, 1345, 0.99, 1);
UPDATE invoices SET Total = (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceId = 251) WHERE InvoiceId = 251;

instruction: Hi, I'm Dominique Lefebvre (email: dominiquelefebvre@gmail.com, Customer ID: 40). I'd like to remove the track 'City Of Blinding Lights' (Track ID: 2968) from my 'Music' playlists, which have Playlist IDs 1 and 8. Please ensure this doesn't affect my purchase history—only remove its links to these playlists.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 40;
DELETE FROM playlist_track WHERE TrackId = 2968 AND PlaylistId IN (1,8);

instruction: My name is Kara Nielsen (kara.nielsen@jubii.dk). I noticed my apartment number was missing from my invoice billing addresses. Please update the BillingAddress on all my invoices from 'Sønder Boulevard 51' to 'Sønder Boulevard 51, Apt 301' to ensure accuracy for future invoices.

actions.sql: UPDATE invoices SET BillingAddress = 'Sønder Boulevard 51, Apt 301' WHERE BillingAddress = 'Sønder Boulevard 51' AND CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'kara.nielsen@jubii.dk');

instruction: Hello, my name is Frank Ralston and my email is fralston@gmail.com. I have identified a duplicate charge for the track 'Say Hello 2 Heaven' (TrackID 3365) on my invoice ID 103. Please remove the specific entry with InvoiceLineID 556 from this invoice.

actions.sql: SELECT 1 FROM invoices i INNER JOIN customers c ON i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId WHERE i.InvoiceId = 103 AND c.Email = 'fralston@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 556 AND InvoiceId = 103 AND TrackId = 3365;

instruction: I am Kathy Chase, and my email is kachase@hotmail.com. I need to update my invoice #277. First, change the billing city to 'Carson City'. Then, add the track with ID 470 to the invoice with a unit price of 0.99 and quantity of 1. Finally, update the invoice total to 9.90 to account for the new item.

actions.sql: SELECT 1 FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId WHERE c.Email = 'kachase@hotmail.com' AND i.InvoiceId = 277;
UPDATE invoices SET BillingCity = 'Carson City' WHERE InvoiceId = 277;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (277, 470, 0.99, 1);
UPDATE invoices SET Total = 9.90 WHERE InvoiceId = 277;

instruction: Hello, I'm Fernanda Ramos (CustomerID: 13, email: fernadaramos4@uol.com.br). I need to correct an error in my purchase for InvoiceID 253. I accidentally ordered two Iron Maiden tracks from the 'Powerslave' album with InvoiceLineIDs 1369 and 1370. Please remove both items and update the invoice total to $0.00.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 13 AND Email = 'fernadaramos4@uol.com.br';
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1369 AND InvoiceId = 253;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1370 AND InvoiceId = 253;
UPDATE invoices SET Total = 0.00 WHERE InvoiceId = 253 AND CustomerId = 13;

instruction: I am Aaron Mitchell (CustomerID 32). I recently purchased 'Da Lama Ao Caos' (TrackID 275, InvoiceLineId 625) via invoice #116. Please add this track to my '90’s Music' playlist (PlaylistID 5).

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId, FirstName, LastName FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 32;
INSERT INTO playlist_track (PlaylistId, TrackId) VALUES (5, 275);
